document_data.mainbody: '''Bazamarl''' was the leader of a cell of the [[Cult of Reborn Flame]] that operated out of [[Sambral]], one of the [[Windrise Ports]] of [[Laerakond]], in [[1479 DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Burning Scent of Perfumed Swords|34}}
document_data.Description: Bazamarl was a bald [[human]] male with an oiled mustache and beard.{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Burning Scent of Perfumed Swords|40}}
document_data.Abilities: Bazalmarl was magically protected against harm by [[fire]].
document_data.History:
In 1479 DR, Bazamarl was the leader of the cell of the Cult of Reborn Flame in Sambral. His job was to care for the cult's magical pet, the [[Firebird (elemental)|Firebird]]. To feed the Firebird, Bazalmarl commanded his fellow cultists to kidnap citizens on a regular basis.

Bazalmarl was killed by a band of [[adventurer]]s that were sent by [[Halagothra|Halagothra the Healer]] to Sambral to destroy the cell of the cult operating there.{{Cite organized play/LFR/The Burning Scent of Perfumed Swords|45}}
